steps.name: Landing Page
steps.text: Let’s start with your homepage. This will be the center of your site.

steps.name: Product Editor Page
steps.text:
This is the Product Editor Page.
This page will enable you to edit products.
Enter in the product SKU or UPC to edit.

steps.name: Sub Accounts
steps.text:
This page will let you add in employees.
Click Create Account to get started.

steps.name: Create New Account
steps.text:
This is where you will be entering the details.
Will this Employee be creating an order? Click here

steps.name: Bank Settings
steps.text:
The bank settings will handle all your transactions.
When you are ready to go live click Enable Stripe.
Stripe is a 3rd party system we use.

steps.name: Data Report
steps.text:
The Data Report is the report card for all your content.

This page shows how good your ecommerce site is doing with individual aspects.

steps.name: Custom Pages
steps.text:
In this page you can modify the navigation bar that shows up on your homepage.

Click here to modify.

steps.name: Landing Page
steps.text:
This page will show you how your homepage is viewed.

Customize different features on here.

steps.name: Department Mapping
steps.text:
This page allows you to manage your departments, classes & finelines.

You can group multiple categories into one alias which will display on your E-commerce website. EZ-commerce is based on a 3 level max taxonomy.

steps.name: About Us
steps.text:
This page lets you customize your about us section.
Make your page as personable as you’d like!

steps.name: Orders
steps.text:
This page will let you view all orders placed.
There are different categories you can go through.

steps.name: Transactional Emails
steps.text:
This page lets you manage all the emails you will send through you business.

In this page you can customize each email.

steps.name: Stats & Analytics
steps.text:
This page gathers all the data of the stats and analytics from your ecommerce site.

On this page you can view items recently added to carts, abandoned carts and items, etc.
